text: Læa cng raluk thung khwam kruna metta khx ngxallxhˌ thi mi tx phwk cea læa sayya khxng phraxngkh thi di thrng kratha man wi kæ phwk cea khna thi phwk cea klaw wa phwk rea diyin læw læa phwk rea cheuxfang læw læa phung ya ke rng xallxhˌ theid thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng rxbru thung sing thi xyu nı thrwngxk
